title: Minecraft PC/Mac版销量达到1900万份
author: kamenyy
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kamenyy 于 2015-3-27 17:36 编辑 

PC/Mac version   
    
19,005,385 people have bought the game.    
In the last 24 hours, 8,172 people bought the game. 

消息来自：minecraft.net/stats

截止至本帖发布，Minecraft PC/mac的销量已经达到了19,005,385 份。
